tutorial.title: Linktree - Part 1
tutorial.descriptionContent: Get ready to build your very own Linktree-style page, where you can showcase all your socials and other links you care about in one spot.

executableContent.instructions:
Welcome to the **Linktree** project! We'll build your personal page (like the famous link-in-bio pages).

1. Start by adding an **h1 element** with your name.

Hint: After writing some code, you can check the output in the Browser tab. This won't submit your work yet.
1. Now, add an **h2 element** with some text describing yourself, for example "Aspiring Software Developer".

Fantastic! We now need some text to welcome visitors to the page.

1. Below the `h2` element, add a paragraph with a welcome message.

Hint: AI can write a welcome message for you!

files.name: index.html
files.solvedContent:
Emmy

Aspiring Software Developer

Welcome to my page! I'm Emmy, an aspiring software developer. Follow my journey by checking out my social media profiles. Happy coding!

executableContent.instructions:
Let's continue by adding links to your social media profiles.

1. Below the paragraph, add as many links as you want.

If you don't know the exact URLs, ask AI to add a generic URL like `https://example.com`.  We'll save your code so that you can update it later.

files.name: index.html
files.solvedContent:
Emmy

Aspiring Software Developer

Welcome to my page! I'm Emmy, an aspiring software developer. Follow my journey by checking out my social media profiles. Happy coding!

Instagram TikTok

hints.title: Linking to other websites
hints.content:
Some websites don't let you link directly to them and open them up inside another page. To fix that, you can add the following attribute to your anchor tag:
```HTML
target="_blank"
```

executableContent.instructions:
Great job! Next, we'll learn how to make it look good. In the meantime, how about playing around with AI? **At Mimo, we believe AI won’t replace developers, but developers who use AI tools will have an edge over those who don’t.**

1. When ready, submit your code to continue.
